#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
int a[2105][2105];
int main(){
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while (t--) {
    string a,b;
    cin>>a>>b;
    int zb = 0,za = 0,ob = 0,oa = 0;
    for(int i = 0;i < a.size();i++){
      if(a[i] == '0'){
        za++;
      }else{
        oa++;
      }
    }
    for(int i = 0;i < a.size();i++){
      if(b[i] == '0'){
        zb++;
      }else{
        ob++;
      }
    }
    if((oa == 0 && ob > 0) || (za == 0 && zb > 0)){
      cout<<"Unlucky Chef"<<endl;
      continue;
    }
    int zeroToOne = 0,oneToZero = 0;
    for(int i = 0;i < a.size();i++){
      if(a[i] == '0' && b[i] == '1'){
        zeroToOne++;
      }else if(a[i] == '1' && b[i] == '0'){
        oneToZero++;
      }
    }
    int ans = max(oneToZero,zeroToOne);
    cout<<"Lucky Chef"<<endl;
    cout<<ans<<endl;
  }
}
